title: The Christmas Guardians: A heart-warming, small town Christmas story with a dash of Heaven.
description: "A beautiful story about love, forgiveness and the goodness of others. This book is about family, friendship, and helping those around you even when times are hard." "Janice Voorhies shows why she has a reputation as a captivating storyteller." When a retired schoolteacher finds a lost child, who can’t remember her name, the schoolteacher and her elderly neighbor embark on a quest to discover the child’s identity and return her to her family. They encounter a mystery, foster a romance, rescue a community choir, assist a family in crisis, and witness a miracle. Along the way, they remind their small Utah town of the things which really matter in friendship, service, forgiveness, and the strength of family.
author: Janice Voorhies
